CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Without using any additive and any post-treatment , polymer solar cells based on PSFDTBT / PC71BM demonstrated a PCE of 4.6% with a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V. This is the first report on spirobifluorene - based polymers applied in BHJ PSCs.

| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

The entity "Spirobifluorene" is not included in the table as it is not clearly referred to as a material name in the paragraph.

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Without using any additive and any post-treatment , polymer solar cells based on PSFDTBT / PC71BM demonstrated a PCE of 4.6% with a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V. This is the first report on spirobifluorene - based polymers applied in BHJ PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| open-circuit voltage |

The following entities do not clearly refer to material properties:

* PCE (it's a abbreviation for "power conversion efficiency", which is a property of a device, not a material)
* spirobifluorene (it's a type of polymer, not a material property)
* BHJ PSCs (it's an abbreviation for "bulk heterojunction photovoltaic cells", which is a type of device, not a material property)
